creditline: The Thomas L. Daniels Memorial Fund
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

The ribbon-tied cartouches on the pot and caddy are the star like cartouche on the stand are all vacant.
markings:
Marks; Inscriptions

Teapot fully marked on base, maker\'s mark and lion passant inside cover.  Teapot stand fully marked on underside.  Tea caddy fully marked on base; maker\'s mark over striking that of John Hutson (entered 1784) with lion passant on the stand are all vacant.
title: Teapot
